package.description: This package contains the latest code from the STAIR Vision Library (SVL). This ROS package does not modify the SVL in any way; it simply provides a convenient way to download and compile the library in a way that can be managed by the ROS dependency system.
package.author: Stephen Gould, Ian Goodfellow, Olga Russakovsky, and many others. ROS package maintained by Ian Goodfellow.
